message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $140. It's a great deal considering its value to you is $150!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a price of $130 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $135. It's still a great price considering its value to you is $150!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $130 for it.
